channel.title: Need a little help with claws on 508
channel.description:
Ok my source is bulby, and i added the d claws spec to rune claws (item id: 3101) and when i spawn them, i cant equip them to use them Help? DX
~~Might Rep++ if you also tell me how to add d claws instead of rune XD~~

item.title: Need a little help with claws on 508
item.dc:creator: @Server_Creator_Brian Server Creator Brian
item.description:
@Server_Creator_Brian wrote:

Ah but i still need to know how to equip the claws.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a little help with claws on 508
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

I heard this from someone, you need to edit the cache to add d claws, which will be illegal. You can create your own cache with d claw.

^may not be true.

Read full topic
